alert.note: Alert for San Diego (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 22 at 10:13AM PST until January 22 at 11:15AM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Diego has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central San Diego County in southwestern California... * Until 1115 AM PST. * At 1012 AM PST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Spring Valley, or near La Mesa, moving east. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. Heavy rain reducing visibility and creating areas of flooding SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Chula Vista, El Cajon, National City, Coronado, Downtown San Diego, Lemon Grove, Encanto, Rancho San Diego, La Presa, Paradise Hills, East Village, Lincoln Park, Logan Heights, Spring Valley, Bonita, Mountain View, South Park, Broadway Heights, Mt Hope, and Jamacha Lomita. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
